sentences.english: The Lan Hui in the idea noodles disdains to and worried, panic the surname in annual to really marry to come in.
sentences.chinese: 瀾惠心裏面既不屑又焦急，生怕年氏真嫁進來。

sentences.english: It was half past ten. Sarie watched the path anxiously .
sentences.chinese: 十點半鐘的時候，莎莉焦急地朝着小路張望。

sentences.english: He was behaving normally in spite of his anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他心中焦急，但仍然舉止如常。

sentences.english: Edgar, in his anxiety for her, forgot her hated friend.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加一心爲她焦急，也忘了她那可恨的朋友。

sentences.english: He walked back and forth at the seashore, anxiously waiting for the return of the fishing-boats.
sentences.chinese: 他在海灘上走來走去，焦急地等待着漁船歸來。

sentences.english: Karl was sweating out the results of the college exams.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾焦急地等待着大學考試的結果。

sentences.english: Wang was very worried, but he knew the train couldn't stop for him to pick the bag up.
sentences.chinese: 王先生十分焦急，但火車不可能停下來，讓他去撿包。

sentences.english: In the afternoon she expressed some anxiety for Georges.
sentences.chinese: 下午，她爲喬治擔着不少焦急。

sentences.english: Mr. Wang was very worried, but he knew the train couldn't stop for him to pick the bag up.
sentences.chinese: 王先生十分焦急，但火車不可能停下來，讓他去撿包。

sentences.english: I kiss him, in fact, impatient for something to happen.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我是很焦急地吻他，期待着有些事情發生。

sentences.english: Liu Mei stopped when she saw the worried woman.
sentences.chinese: 劉梅看到那位焦急的婦女時就停止了腳步。

sentences.english: The man felt irritated and shouted, “What the hell are you afraid of?
sentences.chinese: 那人便焦急起來，嚷道，“怕什麼？

sentences.english: He was sweating blood while she was in the operating room.
sentences.chinese: 她在手術室內動手術時，他焦急萬分。

sentences.english: Everyone is in the street in front of their houses. They are trying to find family members.
sentences.chinese: 所有人都呆在屋前的街道到，焦急的找尋失散的家人。

sentences.english: He spent an anxious day in the lockup.
sentences.chinese: 他在拘留所裏焦急地煎熬了一天。
焦急憂慮可以引起胃病。

definition: to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
